text: I was honored to bring a resolution to authorize this year's Greater Washington Soap Box Derby to be held on the Capitol grounds and glad to see this resolution pass on the Floor today. I encourage everyone to join me in cheering on the soapbox racers on June 18. https://t.co/Aw7IgADFGI

Happy birthday to my friend @RepHoulahan from #PA06. Thank you for your service to our country as a member of the @usairforce and your valuable insight on @HASCDemocrats, @HouseForeign, and @HouseSmallBiz.

Negotiators are working to reach agreement on bipartisan innovation legislation that will spur economic growth by making our businesses and workers more competitive & by strengthening our supply chains. I look forward to bringing that bill to the House Floor when it is ready.
